title: Predicting Tomorrow's Nintendo Direct - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.12.22
description:
EVERYONE is here to talk about tomorrow's Nintendo Direct, Bonnie Ross leaving 343, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:10 - Housekeeping

The rest of the month, we’re continuing the YouTube Live stream experiment!

KFGD live on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!

Screencast live on youtube.com/kindafunny!

Still streaming gameplay on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames


Still doing our launch party on twitch.tv/kindafunnygmes


REACTION CONTENT?!!?!?!?!

The Roper Report  -

00:11:20 - Bonnie Ross Leaving 343 Industries
00:16:50 - Nintendo Direct tomorrow
00:29:13 - Domestic sales of Splatoon 3 for Nintendo Switch surpass 3.45 million in first three days
00:36:47 - Ad
00:38:54 - D23 Gaming Panel Recap
00:57:00 - Assassin’s Creed Updates
01:05:56 - General Ubisoft Forward Recap Bits
01:07:31 - Out today
01:08:46 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
